overview:
JB Serene Resort is exceptionally well-located in Ibrahimpatnam on Nagarjuna Sagar Road, next to Guru Nanak Group of Institutions. Ibrahimpatnam area is reputed for having many educational institutions; the ORR is also within 10 minutes drive away.

World-class IT companies like TCS and Cognizant have huge campuses in Adibatla, which is just 15 mins drive away. TATA Aerospace SEZ and Tata Lockheed Martin are also in the proximity. The Hyderabad International Airport is 20 mins drive away. With such amazing connectivity, JB Serene Resort is bound to become a much sought after destination for both the new home seekers and investors alike.
valuesproject: Location: Ibrahimpatnam on Sagar Road, adjacent Guru Nanak Institutions.
Beautiful entrance with separate entry and exit gates
valueslocation: Educational Institutions like - Guru Nanak Institutions, Gurukula Vidyapeeth High School, Jawaharlal Nehru Institute of Technology
SEZs And Work Places like - TCS Adibatla, Cognizant Technology Solutions, Tata Lockheed Martin Aerostructures Ltd., Tata Sikorsky Aerostructures Ltd.
NEAR TO Tata Aerospace SEZ, BioGenex Life Sciences Pvt. Ltd., Relisys Medical Devices Limited
NEAR TO BANKS like State Bank of India, Andhra Bank, South Indian Bank ATM, Canara Bank
